Package com.qdc.lims.service

package com.qdc.lims.service
Application services that implement business logic and orchestration.

Services coordinate repositories, enforce rules, and provide a stable API for the JavaFX controllers.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.qdc.lims
    LIMS application root package.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminDashboardStatsService
    Service for admin dashboard statistics.
    AuthService
    Authentication helper service used by the desktop login flow.
    BrandingService
    Centralizes whitelabel branding and lab profile information.
    ConfigService
    Service to manage system configuration settings.
    LocaleFormatService
    Locale-aware formatting helper for dates, times, and currency.
    OrderService
    Service for handling lab order creation and related business logic.
    PasswordPolicyService
    Centralized password policy for the desktop application.
    PatientService
    Service for handling patient registration and related logic.
    PurchaseService
    Service for handling inventory purchases and supplier ledger updates.
    ReportExportService
     
    ReportService
    Generates printable PDF lab reports for completed orders.
    ResultService
    Service for handling lab result entry, validation, and saving logic.
    TestDefinitionService
    Application service for managing TestDefinition master data used by the desktop UI.
    UserService
    Service for user management and authentication.
